definition: to play music/to achieve/to present a memorial to the emperor (old)

sentences.english: String Quartet in A minor, Op. 41, No. 1
sentences.chinese: a小調絃樂四重奏，作品41，第一首。

sentences.english: The string quartet was calling, and anyway it would have been bad manners.
sentences.chinese: 絃樂四重奏在召喚，缺席怎麼說都太失禮了。

sentences.english: Quartet for Flute, Oboe, Cello and Harpsichord.
sentences.chinese: 長笛四重奏，雙簧管，大提琴和大鍵琴。

sentences.english: Beethoven String Quartet, Op. 18, No. 2, final Movement.
sentences.chinese: 貝多芬絃樂四重奏，作品18號，第二首，末樂章。

sentences.english: But, one day I would like to take a trio or quartet on the road with me.
sentences.chinese: 但總有一天我要在巡演上來個三重奏，或四重奏。

sentences.english: Transcription of String Quartet No. 1, for orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 爲管絃樂隊而改編的第1絃樂四重奏。

sentences.english: Journey back into Beethoven's mind with the Borromeo String Quartet.
sentences.chinese: 博羅美奧絃樂四重奏將會爲我們進行貝多芬解碼。

sentences.english: Schumann made two principal demands of the prospective composer of string quartets.
sentences.chinese: 舒曼提出了兩個主要要求準作曲家的絃樂四重奏。

sentences.english: Certainly people can take my part in the string quartet.
sentences.chinese: 顯然有人能在管絃樂四重奏裏代替我演奏的。

sentences.english: Bassoon Quartet in F major, Op. 1, No. 2
sentences.chinese: 大調巴松四重奏，作品第1號，第二首。

sentences.english: The Quartet played beautifully, and helped the day to go very smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 四重奏演奏得很美，這天過得非常遐逸。

sentences.english: String Quartet in Aminor op. 51 No. 2
sentences.chinese: 絃樂四重奏，A小調，作品51號之二。

sentences.english: Bassoon Quartet in G major, Op. 1, No. 5
sentences.chinese: 大調巴松四重奏，作品1，第五首。

sentences.english: Leslie: The Physics Department string quartet needs a new cellist.
sentences.chinese: 物理系絃樂四重奏還缺一個大提琴。

sentences.english: Bassoon Quartet in E flat major, Op. 1, No. 4
sentences.chinese: 降E大調巴松四重奏，作品1，第四首。

sentences.english: Bassoon Quartet in B flat major, Op. 1, No. 3
sentences.chinese: 降B大調巴松四重奏，作品第1號，第三首。

definition: musical ensemble of several instruments (e.g. duet 二重奏 or trio 三重奏)
